pain: Portfolio Controls surface raw HTTP errors
why_it_hurts: Advisors receive opaque status messages (e.g., 403) and escalate false incidents.
proposed_solution: Map API error codes to friendly copy and append request IDs
acceptance_criteria: Submitting with an invalid key shows a descriptive inline error (no raw URL) and displays the request ID.

pain: Price fetch failures silently zero holdings
why_it_hurts: Charts collapse to $0 with no alert, leading to incorrect client briefings.
proposed_solution: Display a toast/banner when price fetch fails and retain last good values until a retry succeeds
acceptance_criteria: Triggering `fetchPrices` failure leaves previous values on screen and shows a visible error message.

pain: README references Reports→Import but UI lacks importer
why_it_hurts: Advisors cannot bulk-load historical data despite documentation, forcing manual entry.
proposed_solution: Implement the promised importer or update docs/UI to clarify supported ingestion
acceptance_criteria: Either a Reports importer exists with preview/confirm or README/docs explicitly remove the workflow.

why_it_hurts: Core cash events cannot be recorded because validation blocks zero-price entries.
proposed_solution: Skip price validation for cash-only transaction types and hide the field for them
acceptance_criteria: Submitting a DEPOSIT with blank price succeeds and records the entry.

why_it_hurts: Repeated 404s delay pricing and clutter logs; holdings show zeros.
acceptance_criteria: Portfolio with deposits no longer issues `/prices/undefined` requests in network log.

pain: ROI fallback runs silently after API errors
why_it_hurts: Investors trust stale ROI because the UI never indicates a degraded mode.
proposed_solution: Raise an alert when fallback math is used and include request ID
evidence_refs: UI shows an error banner and labels fallback ROI data.

why_it_hurts: Switching devices resets privacy/compact options, confusing users.
proposed_solution: Persist full settings with the portfolio payload and hydrate on load
acceptance_criteria: Saving then loading on another device restores currency/compact/hide-balance choices.

why_it_hurts: Compliance must copy/paste security events, risking omissions in regulatory filings.
acceptance_criteria: Clicking “Export security events” downloads CSV with events/metadata.

why_it_hurts: Ops miss fresh lockouts unless they manually refresh, violating the runbook.
Stale benchmarks go unnoticed until endpoints throw 503, extending outages.
proposed_solution: Surface `stale_price` in Admin dashboard and alerts

why_it_hurts: Quant team loses data needed for analytics; manual API calls add toil.
proposed_solution: Include all benchmark series in performance CSV builder
